Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomScheduler, RoundRobinScheduler, WeightedScheduler

    public abstract class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Clasa abstracta pentru scheduler. Pentru a fi instantiata trebuie implementata metoda getProcess.
    Author:
    Cristian Pavel - 324 CB
